name: analytics
shortDescription: Configures the gathering of Angular CLI usage metrics.
longDescription:
You can help the Angular Team to prioritize features and improvements by permitting the Angular team to send command-line command usage statistics to Google.
The Angular Team does not collect usage statistics unless you explicitly opt in. When installing the Angular CLI you are prompted to allow global collection of usage statistics.
If you say no or skip the prompt, no data is collected.

### What is collected?

Usage analytics include the commands and selected flags for each execution.
Usage analytics may include the following information:

- Your operating system \(macOS, Linux distribution, Windows\) and its version.
- Package manager name and version \(local version only\).
- Node.js version \(local version only\).
- Angular CLI version \(local version only\).
- Command name that was run.
- Workspace information, the number of application and library projects.
- For schematics commands \(add, generate and new\), the schematic collection and name and a list of selected flags.
- For build commands \(build, serve\), the builder name, the number and size of bundles \(initial and lazy\), compilation units, the time it took to build and rebuild, and basic Angular-specific API usage.

Only Angular owned and developed schematics and builders are reported.
Third-party schematics and builders do not send data to the Angular Team.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.
options.descriptionCn: 在控制台显示关于本命令的帮助信息。

subcommands.name: disable
subcommands.shortDescription: Disables analytics gathering and reporting for the user.

options.name: global
options.description: Configure analytics gathering and reporting globally in the caller's home directory.
options.descriptionCn: 在调用者的主目录中全局配置分析收集和报告。

subcommands.shortDescriptionCn: 为用户禁用分析收集和报告。

subcommands.name: enable
subcommands.shortDescription: Enables analytics gathering and reporting for the user.

options.name: global
options.description: Configure analytics gathering and reporting globally in the caller's home directory.
options.descriptionCn: 在调用者的主目录中全局配置分析收集和报告。

subcommands.shortDescriptionCn: 为用户启用分析收集和报告。

subcommands.name: info
subcommands.shortDescription: Prints analytics gathering and reporting configuration in the console.
subcommands.shortDescriptionCn: 在控制台中打印分析收集和报告配置。

subcommands.name: prompt
subcommands.shortDescription: Prompts the user to set the analytics gathering status interactively.

options.name: global
options.description: Configure analytics gathering and reporting globally in the caller's home directory.
options.descriptionCn: 在调用者的主目录中全局配置分析收集和报告。

subcommands.shortDescriptionCn: 交互式提示用户设置分析收集状态。

shortDescriptionCn: 配置 Angular CLI 使用情况度量的收集策略。
longDescriptionCn:
您可以通过允许 Angular 团队向 Google 发送命令行命令使用统计信息来帮助 Angular 团队确定功能和改进的优先级。 除非您明确选择加入，否则 Angular 团队不会收集使用情况统计信息。安装 Angular CLI 时，系统会提示您允许全局收集使用情况统计信息。 如果您拒绝或跳过提示，则不会收集任何数据。



### 收集什么？

使用情况分析包括每次执行的命令和选定标志。 使用分析可能包括以下信息：

- 您的操作系统（macOS、Linux 发行版、Windows）及其版本。


- 包管理器名称和版本（仅限本地版本）。


- Node.js 版本（仅限本地版本）。


- Angular CLI 版本（仅限本地版本）。


- 运行的命令名称。


- 工作区信息、应用程序和库项目的数量。


- 对于原理图命令（添加、生成和新建）、原理图集合和名称以及所选标志的列表。


- 对于构建命令（构建、服务）、构建器名称、包的数量和大小（初始和惰性）、编译单元、构建和重建所花费的时间，以及基本的特定于 Angular 的 API 用法。



仅报告了 Angular 拥有和开发的原理图和构建器。 第三方原理图和构建器不会向 Angular 团队发送数据。
